item.title: CVE-2024-31428|2024-04-15T09:33:40.515Z -- Rara Theme -- The Conference
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Rara Theme The Conference.This issue affects The Conference: from n/a through 1.2.0.
